main event: On September 30, 1955, near Cedar City, Utah, four observers spotted a square, silver object, approximately the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length, which they claimed to have had a 'mental conversation' with. The object allegedly claimed to be from Jupiter and said it would revisit the observers in two weeks, lasting for about 2 hours.
interesting points: Two of the observers reported having a 'mental conversation' with the object, claiming it was from Jupiter and would revisit them in two weeks.
The object was described as square, silver, and approximately the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length.
The preparing officer believed the object to be some type of silvery balloon or blimp, while some observers claimed it to be some type of natural phenomenon.
The report also mentions a San Paulo physician who photographed a round object that hovered above his fishing vessel, giving off a whitish trail of smoke off Santos, Brazil in late September 1955.
The document also lists various UFO sightings in October 1955, including ones with insufficient data, unidentified objects, and objects speculated to be balloons, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
sighted object: square, silver object, the size of a grapefruit
location: Cedar City, Utah and Santos, Brazil
witnesses: Four observers and a San Paulo physician
